description: Python Kafka utilities library for Django projects, providing easy integration with Apache Kafka using confluent-kafka
rules: Always configure DJANGO_KAFKA settings in Django settings.py before using the library
Use the built-in Django management commands for setting up and running Kafka consumers
Ensure confluent-kafka==1.9.2 is installed as a dependency
Use the Producer class for sending messages and Consumer class for receiving messages
Auto-creation of Kafka topics is supported - configure topic settings in DJANGO_KAFKA
Always handle exceptions when producing or consuming messages
Use proper Django logging configuration for debugging Kafka operations
